thread.title: Dancing With The Stars: new host Shane Bourne cops it from fans |
thread.title_full: Dancing With The Stars: new host Shane Bourne cops it from fans | The Advertiser

author: Network Writer
title: Dancing With The Stars: new host Shane Bourne cops it from fans |
text:
LIVE television is a notoriously tricky gig. Just ask the new host of Dancing With The Stars, comedian Shane Bourne.
The latest season of Seven‚Äôs DWTS kicked off tonight with Bourne ‚Äî the replacement for TV hunk Daniel MacPherson, who dramatically quit the dance contest last May.
And just one episode in, the affable Bourne ‚Äî a TV comedy veteran ‚Äî is already copping it from viewers.
Tough gig ... Shane Bourne has copped a drubbing from DWTS fans. Source: Supplied
Disgruntled DWTS fans took to Twitter to bag the unfortunate new host for televisual offences, with some slamming his use of ‚Äúdad jokes‚Äù and others accusing him of appearing ‚Äúbored and disinterested‚Äù.
LIFE AFTER DAN: Will the new DWTS be a ratings hit?
Not sure about #ShaneBourne as host of #DancingAU a generation out of sync perhaps. Jokes falling flat. Hope he picks up.
‚Äî Mark Hindle CFRE (@MendotaMarkH) July 19, 2015 It was an action-packed opening episode with standout performances from Bachelor hunk Tim Robards, stunning supermodel Samantha Harris and Olympic champion diver Matthew Mitcham, whose energetic performance earned him the first standing ovation of the night.
Please get Shane some new denturesüò¨ #DancingAU
‚Äî Jo‚úå (@joferguson9) July 19, 2015
Shane Bourne is just going with the motions. Edwina is actually running the show #dancingau
‚Äî Kooka (@Kooka_8) July 19, 2015 Harris, who described herself as a ‚Äúbaby giraffe walking‚Äù overcame first-night nerves to deliver a graceful performance that earned her a score of 24 from the judges.
The beautiful model admitted to being extremely nervous but stunned the judges, particularly Bruno, who praised her ‚Äúnatural elegance‚Äù.
Stunning ... Samantha Harris with dance partner Josh Keefe. Source: News Corp Australia
Harris, who described herself as a ‚Äúbaby giraffe walking‚Äù overcame first-night nerves to deliver a graceful performance that earned her a score of 24 from the judges.
The beautiful model admitted to being extremely nervous but stunned the judges, particularly Bruno, who praised her ‚Äúnatural elegance‚Äù.
The gorgeous 24-year-old has had a difficult year after her fiance Luke Hunt was jailed for causing death by dangerous driving.
Judges Todd McKenney, Bruno Tonioli, Kym Johnson and Helen Richey were in typically forthright form as they returned for season eight.
How absolutely adorable is @SamanthaHarris . So elegant and humble #DWTS2015
‚Äî Lynne McGranger (@LynneMcGranger) July 19, 2015 Samantha Harris is stunning. #DancingAU
‚Äî FreeThePuntKick (@Kristina_Egger) July 19, 2015 Originally published as Bourne cops it from DWTS fans
